column4: Apple in talks to acquire music identification app Shazam: source
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc  is in talks to acquire Shazam Entertainment Ltd  whose software helps users identify songs by pointing their phone at an audio source  according to a person familiar with the situation.

column4: Apple in talks to acquire music identification app Shazam - source
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Dec 8 Apple Inc is in talks to acquire Shazam Entertainment Ltd  whose software helps users identify songs by pointing their phone at an audio source  according to a person familiar with the situation.

column4: California's Getty museum survives wildfire  ready for quakes
column5: Southern California's Getty Center  one of the world's wealthiest art institutions  said it had survived a wildfire tearing through Los Angeles thanks to a disaster plan that has it ready for earthquakes as well.

column4: California's Getty museum survives wildfire  ready for quakes
column5: Dec 9 Southern California's Getty Center  one of the world's wealthiest art institutions  said it had survived a wildfire tearing through Los Angeles thanks to a disaster plan that has it ready for earthquakes as well.

column4: Saddam Hussein at issue in 5th Circuit hearing in hip implant case
column5: Johnson & Johnson argued before a federal appeals court on Thursday that a plaintiffs' lawyer improperly inflamed a jury that awarded $500 million in a hip implant case by suggesting the company had engaged in a range of unsavory conduct  including paying bribes to the regime of former Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein.

column4: KKR's tender offer for Hitachi Kokusai succeeds by slight margin
column5: TOKYO U.S. buyout fund KKR & Co LP  managed a successful tender offer for Japanese semiconductor equipment maker Hitachi Kokusai Electric Inc  by a razor-thin margin  winning 24.9 percent of the company  statements from the companies showed on Saturday.

column4: UPDATE 1-KKR's tender offer for Hitachi Kokusai succeeds by slight margin
column5: * Elliot had bought 8.59 pct stake in Hitachi Kokusai (Recasts with announcement  background)
